question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. The Egg white has more fat value than Egg yolk
  2. The Egg White has less proteins than Egg Yolk
Choose the correct statements:
explanation:
Compared to the whites, egg yolks contain:
  • Less protein: 2.7 grams vs. 3.6 grams.
  • More fat: 4.5 grams or 99 percent of an egg’s fat.
Egg whites are nearly fat-free, containing only one percent of an egg’s fat. Egg whites are also cholesterol-free, low-calorie and contain the greatest percentage of an egg’s protein or 57 percent.
